body: I have some shades generated using the **EPWindowShades** component (see image 1). However, they're not shown when using the **shadings** output node in the **Decompose by Type** component. (image 2) Can anybody kindly advise why this doesn't work? Thanks! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/vr8e9vI-HyOL0LRg*lVHiq05egl8POXA3a2vjmE0cBPyuI6l*GqXJMTGaCCJNbaRKJBImlwXdOoaJC5s5kQF73LicVGEDr*Q/01.PNG)[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/vr8e9vI-HyPJ-FVnhE89A-fPwAVyozj4Gcvx5Earx9sdHkTV--M40xOTN2-9jeptG2RuRw3b5I*usBRzDBaI7au-2RttyNkN/02.PNG)
topic: shades generated by Window Shades Generator are not shown by Decompose by Type
